content: connie s ray of hope is my very first cal and i m so very excited to share this design with you you will need galvanised rings or similar in the following sizes depending what yarn you would like to use 350mm 14 inches for 8 ply / dk 450mm 18 inches for ww or aran you can find out all the information by clicking on the link i recommend joining the groups too which are mentioned in the post i can t wait to see all of your beautiful mandalas parts one through to three can be founds on the link above much love em xo
